abstract: Hundreds gather at enrollment sites around New York City to apply for government-issued identification cards; program is intended to help immigrants, undocumented or otherwise, along with city's homeless, to more easily navigate city services and institutions; de Blasio administration initiative is largest municipal identification program in the nation.
lead_paragraph: New identification cards issued by the city to help undocumented immigrants, homeless people and others drew a large turnout as the de Blasio administration introduced the country’s largest municipal identification program.
snippet: New identification cards issued by the city to help undocumented immigrants, homeless people and others drew a large turnout as the de Blasio administration introduced the country’s largest municipal identification program.

headline.main: New York City’s ID Card Program Draws a Large Response
headline.print_headline: City’s ID Card Program Draws a Large Response
